attributes.action: Increase the ARG Payment for close contact services
attributes.additional_details: The ARG Payment should be the equivalent to the previous ARG Payment! This payment is towards ongoing business costs, we also need the restart! We also need to boost our businesses. Our businesses are just as important as salons on the high Street or on street corners. Most salons don't pay business rates. Yet they have recieved a grant because they fall under the rates category. We want to understand why these businesses are exempt and why we have been treated differently. We want the same
attributes.background: The ARG Payment is an insult to home businesses and renters within the close contact sector. We are exempt from business rates just like many salons that are exempt but there's a large difference in payment. Salons have been allocated £8000 yet the ARG Payment is £1700.

rejection.details: It is up to individual councils to determine which businesses to support and determine the amount of funding provided from the ARG scheme, but you may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577659
